mapper.update: update feedback set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, repair_img_url = #{repairImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, feedback = #{feedback,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repair_time = #{repairTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, repair_phone = #{repairPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repair_name = #{repairName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where feedback_id = #{feedbackId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select feedback_id, userid, repair_img_url, feedback, repair_time, repair_phone,repair_name from feedback
